Text:
Thanks for the great not-on-DVD movie.

It would be good to post more info... like is the PAL or NTSC?

It is indeed, and looks really good for a VHS source.
Thanks again.
No Phyllis, don't let them out!

I just read an article on this in the latest Sight & Sound, which also lamented its unavailability. If there was a commercially available DVD or Blu-Rayof this, I'd jump on it in a heartbeat, but in the meantime - hurrah! Many thanks edu. :)
